subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jeff Skinner had a goal and an assist, and Jay Harrison and Jussi Jokinen also scored to lead the host Carolina Hurricanes over the Toronto Maple Leafs, 3-2, on Sunday night.
snippet: Jeff Skinner had a goal and an assist, and Jay Harrison and Jussi Jokinen also scored to lead the host Carolina Hurricanes over the Toronto Maple Leafs, 3-2, on Sunday night.
